column5: Heading up to Eagle Lake Sat., Vermillion Bay side. Any reports or recent experiences that would be helpful? Thanks!
A Canadian site called http://www.justfishontario.com has fishing reports from Eagle. Andy Myers Lodge does a good one. He has the most up to date postings. Good luck.
Thanks Buzzard! Went to Meyers Lodge and update was very good.

Just got back from Eagle and stayed with Steve Herbeck at Andy Myers lodge. He has a top program and top notch American fishing legends in to help the guests learn the ins and outs. Some of the best names in the business. Because of that help, we had our best year ever with three fish over ten pounds. Thumbs up to Herbie
